info.title: Catalyst Gateway
info.description:
# Catalyst Gateway API.

The Catalyst Gateway API provides realtime data for all prior, current and future Catalyst Voices voting events.

get.description:
This endpoint is used to determine if the service has started properly
and is able to serve requests.

## Note

*This endpoint is for internal use of the service deployment infrastructure.
It may not be exposed publicly.*

This endpoint is used to control internal service inspection features.

## Note

*This endpoint is for internal use of the service deployment infrastructure.
It may not be exposed publicly.*

parameters.name: log_level
parameters.description: The log level to use for the service.  Controls what detail gets logged.

parameters.name: query_inspection
parameters.description:
Enable or disable Verbose Query inspection in the logs.  Used to find query
performance issues.

get.description:
This endpoint returns the total Cardano's staked assets to the corresponded
user's stake address.

parameters.name: stake_address

schema.title: Cardano stake address
schema.description: Cardano stake address, also known as a reward address.

parameters.description:
The stake address of the user.
Should be a valid Bech32 encoded address followed by the https://cips.cardano.org/cip/CIP-19/#stake-addresses.

parameters.name: network
parameters.description:
Cardano network type.
If omitted network type is identified from the stake address.
If specified it must be correspondent to the network type encoded in the stake
address.
As `preprod` and `preview` network types in the stake address encoded as a
`testnet`, to specify `preprod` or `preview` network type use this
query parameter.

parameters.name: asat

schema.title: As At this Time OR Slot.
schema.description:
Restrict the query to this time.
Time can be represented as either the blockchains slot number, 
or the number of seconds since midnight 1970, UTC.

If this parameter is not defined, the query will retrieve data up to the current time.

parameters.description:
A time point at which the assets should be calculated.
If omitted latest slot number is used.

200.description:
## Ok

The amount of ADA staked by the queried stake address, as at the indicated slot.

get.description:
This endpoint gets the latest registration given either the voting key, stake
address, stake public key or the auth token.

Registration can be the latest to date, or at a particular date-time or slot
number.

schema.title: Stake Address or Voting Key.
schema.description:
Restrict the query to this Stake address, or Voters Public Key.
If neither are defined, the stake address(es) from the auth tokens role0 registration are used.

schema.title: As At this Time OR Slot.
schema.description:
Restrict the query to this time.
Time can be represented as either the blockchains slot number, 
or the number of seconds since midnight 1970, UTC.

If this parameter is not defined, the query will retrieve data up to the current time.

schema.title: Page
schema.description:
The page number of the data.
The size of each page, and its offset within the complete data set is determined by the `limit` parameter.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description:
The size `limit` of each `page` of results.
Determines the maximum amount of data that can be returned in a valid response.

This `limit` of records of data will always be returned unless there is less data to return 
than allowed for by the `limit` and `page`.

*Exceeding the `page`/`limit` of all available records will not return `404`, it will return an 
empty response.*

post.summary: Post A Signed Document Index Query.
post.description:
This endpoint produces a summary of signed documents that meet the criteria
defined in the request body.

It does not return the actual documents, just an index of the document identifiers
which allows the documents to be retrieved by the `GET document` endpoint.

schema.title: Page
schema.description:
The page number of the data.
The size of each page, and its offset within the complete data set is determined by the `limit` parameter.

schema.title: Limit
schema.description:
The size `limit` of each `page` of results.
Determines the maximum amount of data that can be returned in a valid response.

This `limit` of records of data will always be returned unless there is less data to return 
than allowed for by the `limit` and `page`.

*Exceeding the `page`/`limit` of all available records will not return `404`, it will return an 
empty response.*

schema.title: Document Index Query Filter
schema.description:
A Query Filter which causes documents whose metadata matches the provided
fields to be returned in the index list response.

Fields which are not set, are not used to filter documents based on those metadata
fields. This is equivalent to returning documents where those metadata fields either
do not exist, or do exist, but have any value.

allOf.title: Document Index Query Filter
allOf.description:
A Query Filter which causes documents whose metadata matches the provided
fields to be returned in the index list response.

Fields which are not set, are not used to filter documents based on those metadata
fields. This is equivalent to returning documents where those metadata fields either
do not exist, or do exist, but have any value.

Cip36Details.description: CIP36 Registration Data as found on-chain.

slot_no.title: Cardano Blockchain Slot Number
slot_no.description: Blocks Slot Number that the registration certificate is in.

stake_pub_key.title: Ed25519 Public Key
stake_pub_key.description: Full Stake Address (not hashed, 32 byte ED25519 Public key).

nonce.title: Nonce
nonce.description:
The current slot at the time a transaction was posted.
Used to ensure out of order inclusion on-chain can be detected.

*Note: Because a Nonce should never be greater than the slot of the transaction it is found in, 
excessively large nonces are capped to the transactions slot number.*

txn.title: Transaction Index
txn.description: The Index of a transaction within a block.

payment_address.title: Cardano Payment Address
payment_address.description: Cardano Cip-19 Formatted Shelley Payment Address.

is_payable.title: Payable indicator
is_payable.description: If the payment address is a script, then it can not be payed rewards.

cip15.title: CIP-15 Indicator
cip15.description: If this field is set, then the registration was in CIP15 format.

errors.title: Error Message
errors.description:
If there are errors with this registration, they are listed here.
This field is *NEVER* returned for a valid registration.
errors.example: An error has occurred, the details of the error are ...

Cip36RegistrationList.description: List of CIP36 Registration Data as found on-chain.

slot.title: Cardano Blockchain Slot Number
slot.description:
The Slot the Registrations are valid up until.

Any registrations that occurred after this Slot are not included in the list.
Errors are reported only if they fall between the last valid registration and this
slot number.
Earlier errors are never reported.

voting_key.description: List of registrations associated with the query.

invalid.description: List of latest invalid registrations that were found, for the requested filter.

page.title: The Page of CIP-36 Registration List.

The page number of the data.

Determines the maximum amount of data that can be returned in a valid response.

This `limit` of records of data will always be returned unless there is less data to return

not the number of Document IDs.

DocumentIndexQueryFilter.description:
Query Filter for the generation of a signed document index.

The Query works as a filter which acts like a sieve to filter out documents
which do not strictly match the metadata or payload fields included in the query
itself.

type.title: Signed Document Type
type.description:
## Signed Document Type.

The document type must match one of the
[Registered Document Types](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/types/)

UUIDv4 Formatted 128bit value.

id.title: Document ID Selector
id.description:
## Document ID

Either an absolute single Document ID or a range of
[Document IDs](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#id)

allOf.title: Document ID Selector
allOf.description: Either a absolute single Document ID or a range of Document IDs

ver.title: Document Version Selector
ver.description:
## Document Version

Either an absolute single Document Version or a range of
[Document Versions](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#ver)

allOf.title: Document Version Selector
allOf.description: Either a absolute single Document Version or a range of Document Versions

ref.title: Document Reference
ref.description:
## Document Reference

A [reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#ref-document-reference)
to another signed document.  This fields can match any reference that matches the
defined [Document IDs](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#id)
and/or
[Document Versions](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#ver)

The kind of document that the reference refers to is defined by the
[Document Type](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/types/)

allOf.title: Document Reference
allOf.description:
A Signed Documents
[Reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#ref-document-reference)
to another Documents ID and/or Version.

*Note: at least one of `id` or `ver` must be defined.*

template.title: Document Reference
template.description:
## Document Template

Documents that are created based on a template include the
[template reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#template-template-reference)
to another signed document.  This fields can match any template reference that
matches the defined [Document IDs](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#id)
and/or
[Document Versions](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#ver)

The kind of document that the reference refers to is defined by the
[Document Type](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/types/)
however, it will always be a template type document that matches the document
itself.

allOf.title: Document Reference
allOf.description:
A Signed Documents
[Reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#ref-document-reference)
to another Documents ID and/or Version.

*Note: at least one of `id` or `ver` must be defined.*

reply.title: Document Reference
reply.description:
## Document Reply

This is a
[reply reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#reply-reply-reference)
which links one document to another, when acting as a reply to it.
Replies typically reference the same kind of document.
This fields can match any reply reference that matches the defined
[Document IDs](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#id)
and/or
[Document Versions](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#ver)

The kind of document that the reference refers to is defined by the
[Document Type](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/types/).

allOf.title: Document Reference
allOf.description:
A Signed Documents
[Reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#ref-document-reference)
to another Documents ID and/or Version.

*Note: at least one of `id` or `ver` must be defined.*

brand.title: Document Reference
brand.description:
## Brand

This is a
[brand reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#brand_id)
to a brand document which defines the brand the document falls under.
This fields can match any brand reference that matches the defined
[Document IDs](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#id)
and/or
[Document Versions](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#ver)

Whether a Document Type has a brand reference is defined by its
[Document Type](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/types/).

allOf.title: Document Reference
allOf.description:
A Signed Documents
[Reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#ref-document-reference)
to another Documents ID and/or Version.

*Note: at least one of `id` or `ver` must be defined.*

campaign.title: Document Reference
campaign.description:
## Campaign

This is a
[campaign reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#campaign_id)
to a campaign document which defines the campaign the document falls under.
This fields can match any campaign reference that matches the defined
[Document IDs](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#id)
and/or
[Document Versions](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#ver)

Whether a Document Type has a campaign reference is defined by its
[Document Type](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/types/).

to another Documents ID and/or Version.

*Note: at least one of `id` or `ver` must be defined.*

category.title: Document Reference
category.description:
## Category

This is a
[category reference](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/meta/#category_id)
to a category document which defines the category the document falls under.
This fields can match any category reference that matches the defined
[Document IDs](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#id)
and/or
[Document Versions](https://input-output-hk.github.io/catalyst-libs/architecture/08_concepts/signed_doc/spec/#ver)

Whether a Document Type has a category reference is defined by its

specified the Document ID.
If the Document ID is not specified, then all documents that match the version will be
returned in the index.
